summary.span: 指示在 ExternalDataExchange 接口上定义的方法和事件中相关性使用的参数的名称。

span.span: Indicates the name of the parameter used for correlation in the methods and events defined on an ExternalDataExchange interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 默认设置；可以由 覆盖。Default setting; can be overridden by the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 EnternalDataExchange 接口的 CorrelationParameterAttribute。The following code example demonstrates how to use a CorrelationParameterAttribute for an EnternalDataExchange interface. 此代码示例摘自“CorrelatedLocalService”SDK 示例。This code example is from the CorrelatedLocalService SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联本地服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
